report.title: Taxon derived validation rules for occurrence attributes
report.description: For a chosen taxon, suggests validation rules for the dynamic occurrence attributes based on the taxon character data.
report.query: SELECT DISTINCT ON (oattla.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id) #columns# -- From the entered taxon. FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl -- Find the entered taxon's parents. JOIN cache_taxon_paths ctp ON ctp.external_key=cttl.external_key -- Find attributes linked to any of it's parents. JOIN occurrence_attribute_taxon_restrictions oatr ON ctp.path @> ARRAY[oatr.restrict_to_taxon_meaning_id] AND oatr.deleted=false -- Occurrence_attributes_websites gives us the occattr ID. JOIN occurrence_attributes_websites oaw ON oaw.id=oatr.occurrence_attributes_website_id AND oaw.deleted=false JOIN occurrence_attributes oa ON oa.id=oaw.occurrence_attribute_id -- Only lookups or numbers are relevant AND oa.data_type IN ('L', 'I', 'F', 'B') AND oa.deleted=false -- Find the linked taxon attributes. JOIN occurrence_attributes_taxa_taxon_list_attributes oattla ON oattla.occurrence_attribute_id=oaw.occurrence_attribute_id AND oattla.validate_occurrence_attribute_values_against_taxon_values AND oattla.deleted=false -- Find the linked taxon attribute values. JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attributes ttla ON ttla.id=oattla.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id AND ttla.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav ON ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=ttla.id AND ttlav.deleted=false -- Find the taxon level this is linked at so we can priorities more specific taxa. -- This also limits the attribute values to those in the taxonomic path. JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlattr ON cttlattr.id=ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ctp.path @> ARRAY[cttlattr.taxon_meaning_id] WHERE cttl.id=#taxa_taxon_list_id# ORDER BY oattla.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id, cttlattr.taxon_rank_sort_order DESC;
